description: This file defines the AppTheme class for a Flutter application, providing centralized theming styles including color palette, theme data, motion durations, and gradients following the 'Ocean Professional' style guide with modern design elements.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: Contains static theming colors, durations, ThemeData configuration, and styling elements for the app following specific design guidelines.

classes.name: _AppMotionTheme
classes.description: A ThemeExtension class encapsulating motion-related theme properties such as durations and transition curves.

methods.name: lightTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a ThemeData object configured with color scheme, component themes, and transition animations following the specified style guide.
